modName: Ring of the Time Lords - slow-mo ring
summary: a ring that allows the user to slow time to a hundreth of its normal value and heals while in slow mo. great for running away.
descriptionHtml:
Note this is my first mod that ive released publicy so do enjoy

I love the slow mo kills in this game and wnted more matrix styled fighting so after screwing around for a hour and a half with the creation kit and a little help from my freinds i got this magnifisent ring.

-News-
<origanal report> I\'m shuting this mod down because me and Derangedhk417 have teamed up to increasse the point of this mod with a new one
Crypt of the Time King
no link yet try back later
so plz dont come for patches here out. for those of you usiong manager if you see 2.0 appear for the patch that means we have finished the crypt and want you to beta.
ty have a nice day.<origanal report> im sorry to announce that because of the sudden wave of slow time rings (one mods didnt work two wasn\'t enogh so peaple had to make 7) the team has made the desicion to discontinue this mod we may finish the crypt but as of right now dont expect it till late summer if at all.
we digress our most humble apologize ty.

if you would like to see what we have changed our efforts to and holding the most consorn of the rules to plz visit my page or
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15758
once again we apologize we were almost done just had about 1 more stage and some tweeks on whole new armor sets and we wuld have it out but now we have lost our inspiration.

-Instilation-
just extract it to
C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
and your done

-getting the ring-
you get the ring from a strangeman hiding in the little corner study opposite the wizards room in dragon reach
Note:if you kill him after ou get the ring or on accident because you were wanted and he attacked you he eventually respawns.

-How it works-
just equip the ring to start slow motion and unequip it to stop it.
i surgest favoriting it so you can just puch the hot key to turn it on and off.

-what if i just want the enchantment?-
ive taken the liberty of combining my old files of the enchantent and his ring so you just have to dowload one so once your in game type
help slowmo 0

-Changes-
_1.6(most likly last(may do a 2.0 to add textures))_
added new ring to make for a beter quest(this is the new 100th speed)(read above)
_1.5_ 
lowered power of ring to make up for the next patch lowered price.
_1.4_
added npc in dragonreach
_1.0_
Public release.

-Hopeful for the future-
make you earn the ring through a mission started at current npc
add a dungeon with the chest in it to get the ring
change the rings texture so its more then just a enchanted ring

note plz ask befor expanding on this.


speical thanks go to:
my freind Derangedhk417 who dosnt have a nexxas account for introducing me to creation kit.
nagarian78 - for filling in the one part of the item i was missing
3JIou - for his deadly dragon mod that made dragon fights hard as hell making me need a chicken out plan.

and i think thats it.
author: Sorydrew

files.name: Ring of the Time Lords
files.changelogHtml:
added pc merchant in dragonreach
added ores to merchant
added a sword to the merchant if you decide to kill him
